name: lispyscript
description: A JavaScript with Lispy Syntax and Macros
author: Santosh Rajan

scripts.prepublish: lispy src/lispy.ls lib/lispy.js && lispy src/repl.ls lib/repl.js && lispy src/require.ls lib/require.js && browserify lib/browser.js -o lib/browser-bundle.js && cp lib/browser-bundle.js examples/browser/js && cp src/macros.ls examples/browser/src
